subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Olli Jokinen scored two goals in his first game for Calgary, and Jordan Leopold, another trade-deadline acquisition, also had a goal, leading the Flames to a 5-1 victory.
snippet: Olli Jokinen scored two goals in his first game for Calgary, and Jordan Leopold, another trade-deadline acquisition, also had a goal, leading the Flames to a 5-1 victory.
